english_example_sentence: You cannot try that expensive Italian restaurant without reservation
russian_example_sentence: Ты не можешь попробовать этот дорогой итальянский ресторан без бронирования
turkish_example_sentence: Sen rezervasyon olmadan o pahalı İtalyan restoranını deneyemezsin
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen rezervasyon olmadan o pahalı İtalyan restoranını ______
